Python - pip

Table of contents

  • For Windows
  • For Linux
  • Commands & Usage
  • Auto-Completion
  • Except.List
    • Reference

For Windows

  1. cmd.exe

  2. cd c:\python27

  3. cd Scripts

  4. pip.exe $path\get-pip.py ($path == c:)

- pip.exe c:\get-pip.py

  ![install_pip_for_windows.png](install_pip_for_windows.png)

For Linux

Online

get-pip.py

$ wget https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py
$ python get-pip.py
# ...

$ pip-9.0.1 setuptools-32.1.2 wheel-0.29.0
$ pip --version
$ pip install --upgrade pip

Yum (/usr)

  • pip2

    • get-pip 방법과 동일.

  • pip3

$ yum install epel-release.noarch
$ yum install python34-devel

$ wget https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py
$ python3 get-pip.py
# ...

$ pip3 --version
$ pip3 install --upgrade pip

  • Offline

    • Compile (/usr/local)
    • 기본적으로 /usr/local/bin/ 이 먼저 동작. (환경변수에서 조절 가능)
    • compile 설치된 python 은 내장된 python 설치 경로가 다르기 때문에 주의.
    • 설치시 python2 또는 python3 으로 실행하면 pip2 또는 pip3 가 설치됨.
    • pip3 는 python3 설치하면서 동적으로 설치될 수 있음.
    • Requierments

    • wheel

      wget https://pypi.python.org/packages/a7/37/947b4329c4a3c72093b6c8e9b4be8c7f10c32dbb78848d3a234ce01c059d/wheel-0.30.0a0.tar.gz#md5=aa1145d48e4da2f9415eac2d51468a83 tar xzvfp wheel-x.x.x.tar.gz python bootstrap.py python setup.py build python setup.py install

    • setupuptools

      wget https://github.com/pypa/setuptools/archive/master.tar.gz#egg=setuptools-dev tar xzvfp setupuptools-x.x.x.tar.gz python bootstrap.py python setup.py build python setup.py install

    • PIP

      wget https://pypi.python.org/packages/11/b6/abcb525026a4be042b486df43905d6893fb04f05aac21c32c638e939e447/pip-9.0.1.tar.gz#md5=35f01da33009719497f01a4ba69d63c9 tar xzvfp pip-x.x.x.tar.gz python2 ./setup.py build python2 ./setup.py install

Commands & Usage

pip search [package_name]             # Search Packages
pip install [package_name]            # Install Pacakges
pip install --upgrade [package_name]  # Update Packages
pip list [package_name]               # Search Installed Packages
pip list > requierments.txt           # Backup Pacakges
pip freeze > requierments             # Backup Pacakges
pip install -r requierments.txt       # Install Backup Pacakges

Auto-Completion

git clone https://github.com/ekalinin/pip-bash-completion.git  pip-bash-completion
cd pip-bash-completion
mv -v ./pip /etc/bash_completion.d/
rm -rf pip-bash-completion

Except.List

  • setuptools

    File "/root/downloads/setuptools-master/setuptools/command/bdist_egg.py", line   223, in run
  dry_run=self.dry_run, mode=self.gen_header())
File "/root/downloads/setuptools-master/setuptools/command/bdist_egg.py", line   465, in make_zipfile
  z = zipfile.ZipFile(zip_filename, mode, compression=compression)
File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/zipfile.py", line 736, in __init__
  "Compression requires the (missing) zlib module"
RuntimeError: Compression requires the (missing) zlib module
    • zlib, zlib-devel 필요, Python configure 당시 zlib, zlib-devel 이 없이 진행함.
    • zlib, zlib-devel 설치 후 Python 재설치 필요.

  • openssl

    pip3 install --upgrade pip
...
pip is configured with locations that require TLS/SSL, however the ssl module in Python is not available.
Could not fetch URL https://pypi.python.org/simple/pip/: There was a problem confirming the ssl certificate: Can't connect to HTTPS URL because the SSL module is not available. -     skipping
Requirement already up-to-date: pip in /usr/local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/pip-9.0.1-py3.5.egg
    • openssl-devel 필요.

  • pip3 Path

    • python3 compile 설치시 pip 가 동적 설치 됨.

  • zlib

    Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "get-pip.py", line 20061, in <module>
    main()
  File "get-pip.py", line 194, in main
    bootstrap(tmpdir=tmpdir)
  File "get-pip.py", line 82, in bootstrap
    import pip
zipimport.ZipImportError: can't decompress data; zlib not available
    • zlib, zlib-devel 필요.

Reference

https://github.com/portal2312/pip-bash-completion

https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py

https://github.com/pypa/setuptools/archive/master.tar.gz#egg=setuptools-dev

https://pypi.org/project/pip/#files
